<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108283</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108283</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205261</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Right to Bear Arms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Recht, Arme zu tragen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La droite de soutenir des bras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A direita carregar os braços</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La destra sopportare l'Armi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το δικαίωμα να αντεχτούν τα όπλα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La derecha de llevar los brazos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson explores the issues surrounding the Second Amendment and the issue of gun control. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion erforscht die Ausgaben, welche die 
zweite Änderung und die Ausgabe der Gewehrsteuerung umgeben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon explore les issues entourant le 
deuxième amendement et la question de la commande de pistolet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição explora as edições que cercam a 
segunda emenda e a introdução do controle do injetor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione esaminare le edizioni che 
circondano la seconda correzione e l'emissione di controllo della 
pistola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα ερευνά τα ζητήματα που περιβάλλουν τη 
δεύτερη τροποποίηση και το ζήτημα του ελέγχου πυροβόλων όπλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección explora las ediciones que rodean la 
segunda enmienda y la aplicación el control del arma.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205261</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108283</entry>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
